name: Infinite Isolation
description:
Infinite Isolation is a survival horror game, where you’re isolated in your home. You cannot leave, as you’re alone and too afraid to go into the unknown. You have to survive in your home and face your fears.
For more info on this game, join the discord and subscribe for news on the game!

https://discord.gg/B4VK7Sd

In this game you should expect the following;

- JUMPSCARES (duh..)
- TENSE ATMOSPHERE - EVERY LEVEL WILL HAVE ITS OWN CHALLENGE/MECHANICS TO IT IN ORDER TO KEEP THE PLAYSTYLE AS FRESH AND UNIQUE AS POSSIBLE
- FLASHING LIGHTS
- LOUD NOISES
- OUT OF PROPORTION SILHOUETTES
- SECRETS
